Flow.description: 1/5/2026 (v4) - Updated to create Finance Request in Submitted Status instead of Draft.
Flow.label: Opportunity Product - SF - Reallocation Request

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a max of 255 characters.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_dt_Error_Creating_Finance_Request
fields.fieldText:
Oops! There was an error while attaching files to the Reallocation Request.


Please share the following error message with your Salesforce Administrator at salesforce@erepublic.com:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: dt_Error_Creating_Finance_Request
fields.fieldText:
Oops! There was an error creating the Reallocation Request.


Please share the following error message with your Salesforce Administrator at salesforce@erepublic.com:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: dt_Oops_Different_Opp_Owners
fields.fieldText:
Oops! These Opportunities have different Owners:


Opportunity Owner: {!var_Reallocate_from_Opp_Product.Opportunity.Owner.FirstName} {!var_Reallocate_from_Opp_Product.Opportunity.Owner.LastName}

Split Opportunity Owner: {!var_Reallocate_to_Opp_Product.Opportunity.Owner.FirstName} {!var_Reallocate_to_Opp_Product.Opportunity.Owner.LastName}


Please start a new request with a reallocation to and from the original opportunity & owner.

screens.name: Oops_Opportunity_Products_are_the_Same
screens.label: Oops Opportunity Products are the Same

fields.name: dt_Oops_Same_Opp_Product
fields.fieldText: Oops! You cannot reallocate money from and to the same Opp Product.

fields.name: dt_Oops_Reallocation_Amount_Overage
fields.fieldText:
Oops! The reallocation amount cannot exceed the Total Price of the Opportunity Product or the Revenue on the selected schedule.


Opportunity Product Total Price: {!Get_Triggering_Opp_Product.TotalPrice}

Schedule Revenue: {!Screen_Starting_Schedules.firstSelectedRow.Revenue}

Reallocation Amount: {!var_Reallocation_Amount}

fields.name: dt_Reallocate_From_Opp_Product
fields.fieldText:
Reallocation Amount:

${!var_Reallocation_Amount}


Reallocate From:

{!Get_Triggering_Opp_Product.Name}

fields.name: dt_Reallocate_To_Opp_Product
fields.fieldText:
Reallocate To:

{!var_Reallocate_to_Opp_Product.Name}

actions.name: Action_Get_Opp_Products
actions.label: Opportunity Product - AL - Get Opportunity Products or Schedules

fields.name: dt_Starting_Opp_Product
fields.fieldText: Starting Opportunity Product: {!Get_Triggering_Opp_Product.Name}

validationRule.errorMessage: Please use a positive value to reallocate.

fields.name: dt_Success_Message
fields.fieldText:
Success! Your Reallocation Request has been created.


View Reallocation Request
